attrs.text: We connect creativity and empathy with technology to co-create inspiring user-driven experiences.

We're a global team
of product creators

attrs.title: Team of strategists
attrs.description: Define, evaluate and refine disruptive strategies, optimize business models and accelerate growth.

attrs.title: Delivery center network
attrs.description:
Prototype, launch and scale your concepts with speed
and precision to reach the market in weeks, not months.

attrs.title: Design studios
attrs.description: Visualize ideas and create immersive, human-centered experiences that wow the end user.

attrs.title: Industry experts
attrs.description: Harness deep subject matter expertise and cross-industry experience to provide the depth needed for your vision to shine.

attrs.text: Your one partner in designing products that delight end‑users and create value

attrs.title: Design Research
attrs.description: Understand the underlying and sometimes unarticulated desires, needs and challenges of end users to determine human-centered solutions that integrate seamlessly into people's lives or workflows.

attrs.title: Design Strategy
attrs.description: Find the equilibrium between what's valuable and what’s profitable for your business to discover the best approach to product development.

attrs.title: Exploring the future of in-car comfort with a world-leading automotive supplier
Storytelling
attrs.description: Develop a deeper connection, unite your audience and drive stronger, more enduring relationships.

attrs.title: Partnering with AppyWay to make parking forgettable
Digital Design
attrs.description: Identify opportunities, map out the information architecture, define the look and feel of your future products and iterate the best possible solution in close exchange with users and stakeholders.

attrs.title: Getting back to work safely with One Concern
Industrial Design
attrs.description: Ideate and develop creative concepts and specifications of manufactured products for optimal value, function, appearance and usability through user-centric design solutions.

attrs.title: Defining luxury TV viewing for the Chinese market
Service Design
attrs.description: Explore, plan and orchestrate all touchpoints between a brand and its customers. Focus on user needs, ensure consistency and create environmentally-conscious innovation.

attrs.title: Connect with us now
attrs.text: Learn more about how Star can help you bring game-changing ideas to market

At Star, we’re all about co-creation. From ideation through
launch, we work with our customers every step of the way.

attrs.title: Empathy, curiosity & human-centered approach
attrs.description: We apply a human-centered approach to innovation and develop products that generate a positive impact.
attrs.tags:
Deliver tangible results through cross-cultural methodologies and a holistic design thinking approach

Harness the latest technologies and create seamless experiences that are a joy to use

Continuously build, test and learn to constantly iterate and refine concepts and ideas

Enter the unknown with an open visor and work proactively from strategic product definition to market readiness

Co-create with clients and partners and involve them throughout the development process

attrs.title: We liberate better versions of ideas, companies and people.

attrs.text: We promise you the adventure of a lifetime!

attrs.quote: “Empathy is the key to the product creation and the result is based on how far you can go with it.”
“I think it’s a misconception that change is always a revolution. There’re so many ways to build on what you already have.”
“Endgame is understanding why you want to build products, for whom and what problems are going to be solved. It’s about acting and thinking through the customer's pains and gains.”
“To gain client's trust, it's essential to communicate your expertise — and do it in the right way and on time.”

attrs.title: Unleash your greatness
attrs.description: We motivate and inspire our crew members to constantly learn and grow.
attrs.hoverDescription: Variety of knowledge sharing, training and self-development opportunities - Star Web University, Star Expert and Employee Recognition Programs.

attrs.title: Thrive at Star
attrs.description: We foster a healthy and productive work environment.
attrs.hoverDescription: Amazing Star Spaces, flexible working hours, unique travel opportunities, financial security and health packages.

attrs.title: Join a team of craftspeople
attrs.description: We deliver products that drive human progress and technology innovation.
attrs.hoverDescription: Expert teams, next-gen technologies, advanced methodologies and tools.

attrs.title: Work for living — and for being
attrs.description: We celebrate victories and prioritize happiness and productivity.
attrs.hoverDescription: Dynamic tech and educational events, social clubs with top industry experts, corporate celebrations and fun activities.

attrs.title: Lead breakthrough projects
attrs.description: We take pride in crafting remarkable and truly authentic projects.
attrs.hoverDescription: Work on the full product lifecycle — from ideation and concept to delivery and post-market support.
